nodes.message: This should probably be on reset day in dining hall script
Going to bed before midnight, so give Shawn a full night's rest
At this point it is midnight aka the next day.
OnResetDay doesn't get called after 2AM so we need to reset these manually

nodes.text: Huh? What? Did I hear something?
(Yawn) I guess it must have been a dream...
Huh?
Was that the sound of someone running down the hallway?
Whatever... I'm going back to sleep...

nodes.message: After investigation time, so Shawn sleeps until morning.
If Shawn hasn't solved it, Thomas has.

nodes.text: What was that?

nodes.name: Day 2 - Morning
nodes.description: Aeolus dragged me out of bed way too early, made me get dressed and cleaned up, then led me to the dining hall. What is he - my mother? I followed my new classmates to the Rogue Classroom.

nodes.name: Day Three
nodes.description: Tried to sleep in, but Aeolus made too much noise. Besides, I was hungry. Yay me - I'm finding my way around here. Breakfast was weird - tasted like spicy chicken - but yummy. I was almost late for class eating it.

nodes.name: Day 4
nodes.description: Almost overslept. I had to race to breakfast, snag an apple, and then run to class.

nodes.name: Aeolus Leaving
nodes.description: Woke up at dawn because Aeolus was making a racket grabbing all his junk and stuffing stuff into bags. He's heading home for the break. I get a clean room all to myself for a bit.

nodes.text: Zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz
Ah, it feels good to sleep in! Since there's no class, I think I'll have a nice large breakfast today.

nodes.message: Jumping straight to breakfast to skip the Dining Room scene load

nodes.text: ZZZZZZZZ
Zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz Huuuuuuhhhhh ZZZZZZZzzzz
Whoa, slept late - Gotta go!
ZZZZZZZZZZZZ
What? Huh? I'm awake. I'm awake!
ZZZZZZZZ
Why does morning come so early?
ZZZZZZZZ
Yikes! I don't want to miss breakfast again.
ZZZZZZZZ
Heya, Boss... Wake up! Ya gotta help. Ya just gotta. It's scary.
Huh... What?
We need your help, boss. You gotta stop them.
Nice to see you again.
Yeah, yeah, we don't got time for the 'hiya, hiya, pleased to meetcha' crap tonight. Ya got to stop them.
What are you doing here? How did you get in?
I told ya - We need your help. I been trying to talk to you for days! Didn't ya get my apple?
What are you talking about? What's scary?

Ya don't know? Jeez Louise, what ya been doing - hibernating for the winter? The halls are crawling with them! They got teeth like daggers and claws like swords. They can tear you to shreds in no time flat...
You're talking about the Drats?
Of course I'm talking about the Drats! You see any other invasion around here that I don't know about?

options.text: Tell the Kwirk to go Away

nodes.text: It's the middle of the night and I have a test tomorrow. Go away and pester someone else, why don't you? I'm going back to sleep.
Nooo, please boss, ya gotta do something! It's a nightmare out there. We're trapped in our holes and we don't dare come out. We're going to starve if you don't help.
Think of the baby Kwirks, withering away to hairballs...
Why me?
Why are you coming to me for help? I'm not the only person at this school, you know.
Boss, ya owe me a favor. I did what ya asked and gave everything back, even when it meant taking candy away from the baby Kwirks. Do you know what it's like to break the heart of a baby Kwirk?
So what is going on with the Drats? Do you know why they invaded the castle?
Yes! I knew you would help us. Thank you, thank you, thank you!
<sigh>
What do you know about the Drat invasion?
I don't know for sure what's up, but the Queen Drat called in all her warriors and sent them scurrying through the castle. Yesh, they're mean.
The Drats have a Queen?
Yeah. If ya thought Drats were nasty - you should see her. She's huge! Mean, too. Ya don't dare steal.. er... borrow anything from her or all the world's Drats will be after ya.
So where does this Drat Queen hide?
She lives in a room off the wine cellar, but you can't get there from here. The Drats blocked off the doorway with a bunch of junk.
You'll have to come in the back way, by way of the hidden staircase in the torture chamber and through the dungeon below.
So there's a torture chamber at the school?
Under the school, really. It's old and nasty - not a nice place. It's under the creepy guy's room next to the library.
Creepy guy? Do you mean the librarian?
The librarian? No, no, he's not creepy...
Okay, so maybe he's a little creepy. He's just not creepy creepy like this guy is.
You'll know who I'm talking about when ya see him. Gives me the shivers just thinking about him.
So how do I find the 'Creepy Guy?'
Ya know that secret passageway behind the painting in the library? It goes right to the Creepy Guy's room.
Where's this hidden staircase?

Okay, so you know the Underground Corridor has a door to the catacombs? The other door goes to the torture chamber, but you can't get there from here. There's some trick on the other side to opening the door.
Well, there's another secret door in the torture chamber that leads to the hidden staircase that leads down to the dungeon where no Kwirk has gone before.
Toooooo Scary.
What do you mean when you say there's a dungeon under the school?
All I know is that it's dark, dank, and too scary for Kwirks to explore. Good luck with that.
If I tell you I'll help, will you go away and let me get some sleep?
Thank-you, thank-you, thank-you for this, Boss. Stop that Queen from sending in her army of Drats. Do it for the baby Kwirks! You'll be their hero!
Oops, getting late. I'd better run for it to avoid the Drats.
Night-night!

nodes.name: Kwirk Work
nodes.description: The Kwirk showed up on my bed in the middle of the night. Somehow, he talked me into going after the Queen Drat. She's somewhere in a dungion under the castle and I need to find a way past some Creepy Guy to get to her.

nodes.text: I'm going back to sleep. You Kwirks can deal with the Drats. Go away.
Please, boss. This is a school for heroes, right? You're a hero, right?
A hero's got to do what a hero's got to do... isn't that in the rules somewhere?
Come on, boss. You gotta save the baby Kwirks. They depend on you!
Think it over, Boss. It's a dirty job, but someone's got to be a hero.
Ack! It's late... I gotta run.
Just sleep on it boss... and then do the right thing.
Not again! Why is a little noise in the hallway disturbing my sleep - and how can I hear anything over Aeolus' snores?
Okay, I'm getting pretty tired of the nighttime wanderer waking me up in the middle of the night.
This is ridiculous. That stupid school thief keeps disturbing my beauty sleep.

options.text: Get Up and Investigate the Noise

nodes.text: Maybe I should go take a look... It's got to be the thief.
Let's see if I can catch that noisy nuisance this time.
I'm not going to give Terk the satisfaction of kicking the Rogues out of this school. That thief goes down tonight.
No sense in wasting my sleep by worrying over a little noise.
Even if it is the School Thief that's awakening me - it's someone else's problem. Let them deal with it.
So maybe they will kick us Disbarred Bards out of the school because of the school thief... I'd better enjoy sleeping in this nice, comfy bed while I can.
Zzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz.
Morning so soon? At least I get to sleep in today since there's no class. Time to get breakfast.
What time is it? I've got to race to breakfast!
Don't tell me it's time to get up...
What?! It's already time for class!
